"Defend the Energizer Crystals":
"Defend the energizer crystals for a set time.
You will fail if two are destroyed."
"Defend the energizer crystals for a set time!"
"The energizer crystals boosted the PSE occurrence rate!"
"The power of the energizer crystal at $(0) is waning!"
"励起結晶を守り抜け！"

"一定時間、励起結晶を防衛せよ。
２個、破壊されると失敗。"
"一定時間、励起結晶を防衛せよ！"
"励起結晶の効果によって PSEの発生率が上がった！"
"$(0)にある励起結晶の力が減衰している！"

"Defend the energizer crystals!
Remember, the crystals weaken when
there isn't an operative nearby!"

"/face2 The crystals were successfully defended!
The photons have become more active, making
it easier to trigger the PSE!"

"/face4 More energizer crystals were
destroyed than we could afford to lose.
You can go back to your regular duties now."

"The energizer crystal at $(0)
was destroyed! Defend the other crystals!"

"There are only a few energy crystals left!
Protect them at all costs!"

"It looks like new energizer crystals have formed!
Please go defend them! The more crystals you defend, the better!"

"各員、励起結晶を防衛してください！
結晶の周囲にアークスがいないと
力が減衰しますので注意してください！"

"/face2 防衛、成功です！
フォトンが活性化し、ＰＳＥが
発生しやすくなったようです！"

"/face4 規定数以上の励起結晶が
破壊されてしまいました……。
通常任務に戻って下さい。"

"$(0)にある
励起結晶が壊れてしまいました！
他の結晶を防衛してください！"

"励起結晶、残りわずかです！
なんとか守りきって下さい！"

"新たな励起結晶が発生したようです！
防衛をお願いします！
多く守れば状況の好転が期待できます！"

"Protect the energizer crystals. We've learned that
an ARKS operative must stand guard near each
crystal, or its power will fade. Take note."

"All right, we pulled it off.
The photons have become more active.
It is now much easier to trigger the PSE."

"Too many energizer crystals have been
destroyed. I'm pulling the plug on this mission.
Return to your regular duties."

"It looks like the energizer crystal at $(0)
was destroyed. Don't let the same happen to
the others."

"There aren't many energizer crystals left.
Protect the ones that you can."

"It seems like new energizer crystals have formed.
Protect them if possible. The more that make it
through, the greater you'll benefit."

"各員、励起結晶を守り抜け。
結晶近辺にアークスがいないと
力が減衰するようだ。注意しろ。"

"よし、成功だ。
フォトンの活性化を確認、ＰＳＥの
発生確率が飛躍的に上昇している。"

"破壊された励起結晶が
規定数を超えてしまったか……。
防衛はそこまでだ、通常任務に戻れ。"

"$(0)の励起結晶が
壊れてしまったようだ。
他のはやられるなよ。"

"励起結晶の残りが少ないぞ。
守れるものを守っていけ。"

"新たな励起結晶か……
可能ならば、それも守れ。
多く残せば状況の好転が予測される。"

"Oh look, energizer crystals!
They begin to lose their power and can break
if someone doesn't stay close by."

"/face2 It looks like you've done it!
The photons have been energized!
That should help trigger lots of PSE."

"/face4 It seems too many energizer crystals
were destroyed. It's a shame, but we
might as well give up defending them now. "

"Oh no! The energizer crystal at
$(0) was destroyed!"

"/face4 We're running out of energizer
crystals!"

"/face2 A-ha! New energizer crystals!
If we can defend them, something good is
bound to happen!"

"あっ、励起結晶ですねー！
結晶の近くにいないと、どんどん
力がなくなって壊れちゃいますよー！"

"/face2 成功みたいですー！
フォトンの活性化が確認されました！
ＰＳＥ、いーっぱい起こりそうですー！"

"/face4 規定数以上の励起結晶が
破壊されちゃったみたいです……。
残念ですが、防衛は諦めましょうー。"

"ああっ！
$(0)の励起結晶
壊れちゃいましたー！"

"/face4 ううう……励起結晶が
あと、少ししか残っていません……"

"/face2 おおっ！　新しい励起結晶！
あれも守ってあげてくださーい！
守りきるといいことが起きますよー！"
